labs.title: Lab 1: AMP Stack
labs.descr: setting up an AMP stack for use (WAMP) and ensuring smooth run

labs.title: Lab 2: HTML and XML
labs.descr: creating a playlist with some structural languages and styling them up

labs.title: Lab 3: JavaScript and the DOM
labs.descr: iterate through the DOM and perform different events given a users actions

labs.title: Lab 4: AJAX/JSON
labs.descr: revamp of lab 2, using the helpful existence of AJAX and JSON

labs.title: Lab 5: Front-End Optimization
labs.descr: optimizing the run-time of your front-end operations using various means

labs.title: Lab 6: PHP, OOP, and Input Handling
labs.descr: a calculator for the everyday user (maybe)

labs.title: Lab 7: Continuation of First Quiz
labs.descr: first quiz exported to a repository on GitHub and prettied up with some Bootstrap and jQuery UI

labs.title: Lab 8: SQL
labs.descr: creating a database and performing all sorts of commands to export different versions of the database

labs.title: Lab 9: PDO and Prepared Statements
labs.descr: a revamp of the previous lab, but with the use of PDOs and prepared statements
